events.name: PluralSight study group
events.description:
Hello Everyone, As promised on last Powershell Meetup we will start PluralSight Study Group. For this first meet up below suggested course to choose, please choose one. The most voted we will use on upcoming meetup: 1. Using WMI and CIM in PowerShell by Thomas Lee -time 3h 31m 2. Building Advanced PowerShell Functions and Modules by Adam Bertram - time 4h 3. Administering Active Directory with PowerShell by Mike Hammond - time 3h 20m 


Hope to see you soon. Sebastian
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room
